attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8R8enCYcAsYay75O_description
attribs.current:
[[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]]

These numbers may be arranged in any order.
If you dont like these stats you may do 27-point buy with this calculator: http://1-dot-encounter-planner.appspot.com/point-buy-calculator.html

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8zXWnXUzinvvkxqo_description
attribs.current:
Make a token on http://rolladvantage.com/tokenstamp/ upload the token as your character image, and change the character name with this format:

PC Name (Game ID)

This is so the character can be assigned to you and a token can be made even while you are offline. if you fail to follow these instructions the character will eventually get deleted.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO14oH9eWG2rnDyc1Mf_itemcontent
attribs.current: This wooden case can hold up to twenty crossbow bolts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO14otoLApdIDfzC6PQ_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO153eDdOdBHpWQmldH_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO153eDdOdBHpWQmldH_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO157sOrV514ySFuPoe_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO15m74wx9waA9QHHlN_itemcontent
attribs.current: When you use your action to set it, this trap forms a saw-toothed steel ring that snaps shut when a creature steps on a pressure plate in the center. The trap is affixed by a heavy chain to an immobile object, such as a tree or a spike driven into the ground. A creature that steps on the plate must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 piercing damage and stop moving. Thereafter, until the creature breaks free of the trap, its movement is limited by the length of the chain (typically 3 feet long). A creature can use its action to make a DC 13 Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Each failed check deals 1 piercing damage to the trapped creature.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO15m74wx9waA9QHHlN_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Piercing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO15o6d9h9aUicYW3AQ_itemcontent
attribs.current: As an action, you can spill these tiny metal balls from their pouch to cover a level, square area that is 10 feet on a side. A creature moving across the covered area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesnâ€™t need to make the save.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO15vOM2VhzJR2sBNWV_itemcontent
attribs.current: Oil usually comes in a clay flask that holds 1 pint. As an action, you can splash the oil in this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a target creature or object, treating the oil as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target is covered in oil. If the target takes any fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an additional 5 fire damage from the burning oil. You can also pour a flask of oil on the ground to cover a 5-foot-square area, provided that the surface is level. If lit, the oil burns for 2 rounds and deals 5 fire damage to any creature that enters the area or ends its turn in the area. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO15vOM2VhzJR2sBNWV_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 5, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO160Xj6t4ukvLrroY7_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LO16DC7zoeeGiCWtIrG_description
attribs.current: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LO16NJFXmrI6KJS1C3A_description
attribs.current: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO17HUul6qm3SNkFXGw_itemcontent
attribs.current: This armor consists of a coat and leggings (and perhaps a separate skirt) of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal, much like the scales of a fish. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LO17Lc1V-h3nxTyXVEU_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you are hit by an attack or targeted by the magic missile spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LO17Lc1V-h3nxTyXVEU_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO17OGJSpwQbguor936_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LO1B7qu2mhiJHMMqGTx_itemcontent
attribs.current: You regain 2d4 + 2 hit points when you drink this potion.  The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.
